title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Historical Letters and Legislation
body: Historical Letters and Legislation         South Dakota State Historian Doane Robinson. National Park service.  South Dakota State Historian, Doane Robinson, was the first to contact Sculptor Gutzon Borglum in 1924 to talk over the idea of a mountain carving in the Black Hills of South Dakota.
